title: Ranked News
body:
Greetings Summoners,

Today's topic i bring before you is the issue of ranked ques. Every game i have played and spectated has had unranked summoners. Not saying this is a bad thing for we are all their one day but the issue is that because they are unskilled they getting matched up with silver - gold summoners in which they just feed every game and lose. Unranked players should be matched up between bronze 5 - silver 3 nothing higher. Considering this is Pre-Season aswell these unranked summoners are just killing it for us.

This is just my opinion, let me know all your feedback.
Thank you for reading Summoners.

replies.body: Underneath the rankings, it still runs on a basic ELO system. Basically, for unranked players, it assumes you're average until you prove otherwise. Sure, it might not be ideal for those who are already in high silver, but it's the most efficient way of determining the appropriate ranking of fresh level 30s.
New accounts have average MMR, which is roughly silver 4.  So if they win (get carried in) their first few placements, ofcourse they are going to get the higher silvers and lower golds.
That sad moment when a new player has higher MMR than OP.

We can only assume your main is bronze 5, since you hide behind a low level smurf.

I'm not saying you are bronze 5, maybe you are bronze 4, who knows? But unless you are at the depths of low bronze, you have no reason to hide behind a low level smurf.
